description: Identifies participants who were observed at least 1 year and provides the counts of non-malaria parasitemia (both microscopic and sub-microscopic) observations / year. Summary analysis tab shows that increasing AP visits / year causes decrease in malaria diagnoses. 2X2 tab shows a significant correlation between living in traditional homes and malaria diagnoses
